analyzed: bod skad du / dpal bcom ldan 'das ral pa gcig pa la bstod pa /

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ral pa gcig pa la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: dpa' bo gang zhig dus gsum rgyal ba'i thugs rje thugs las sprul pa'i sku //
analyzed: dpa' bo gang zhig dus gsum rgyal ba'i thugs rje thugs las sprul pa'i sku //
translated: The hero who is the emanation of the compassion of the Victorious Ones of the three times,

original: mkha' ltar stong nyid ma ltar snying rje byams sogs tshad med las byung ba //
analyzed: mkha' ltar stong nyid ma ltar snying rje byams sogs tshad med las byung ba //
translated: Arisen from the immeasurable space-like emptiness, mother-like compassion, love, and so forth,

original: padma nyid bus bde chen thob pa de bzhin mi ro khros pa yi //
analyzed: padma nyid bus bde chen thob pa de bzhin mi ro khros pa yi //
translated: Obtains great bliss from the lotus-born, and likewise, from the wrathful corpse.üîΩOn the various seats, the wisdom syllable tam transforms into a skull-cup,

original: sna tshogs gdan stengs ye shes yig 'bru tam las yongs gyur thod pa dang // gri gug las grub h'um dang phyag mtshan 'gro ba'i don sgrub byed pa'i rgyu //üîΩ'bar las gtam byas 'jigs @174a * //
analyzed: sna tshogs gdan stengs ye shes yig 'bru tam las yongs gyur thod pa dang // gri gug las grub h'um dang phyag mtshan 'gro ba'i don sgrub byed pa'i rgyu // 'bar las gtam byas 'jigs @174a * //
translated: And from the curved knife, the h≈´·πÉ and hand implement are the cause for accomplishing the welfare of beings.

original: pa'i sku chen shin tu mi bzad rnams pa'i sku //
analyzed: pa'i sku chen shin tu mi bzad rnams pa'i sku //
translated: From the blazing, the terrifying great body is fully formed.

original: 'gyings pag rab brtan gzi brjid dpal 'bar nyon mongs sgrib tshogs bsreg pa yi //
analyzed: 'gyings pag rab brtan gzi brjid dpal 'bar nyon mongs sgrib tshogs bsreg pa yi //
translated: The blazing splendor of his firm and lofty majesty burns up the mass of obscuring emotions.

original: ye shes me 'bar kun nas 'khyil ba'i 'od zer drag po dpung 'khrigs shing //
analyzed: ye shes me 'bar kun nas 'khyil ba'i 'od zer drag po dpung 'khrigs shing //
translated: The fire of his wisdom blazes, its fierce light swirling like a mass of clouds.

original: sdig pa'i 'jom stabs h'um sgra dang bcas drag po'i gad mo can //
analyzed: sdig pa'i 'jom stabs h'um sgra dang bcas drag po'i gad mo can //
translated: With a terrifying laugh, he tramples on the wicked with a fierce stride and the sound of H≈™·πÉ.

original: phyogs bcur gar 'gyed mi thub gcig tu lha klu ha min dpung las rgyal //
analyzed: phyogs bcur gar 'gyed mi thub gcig tu lha klu ha min dpung las rgyal //
translated: He dances in the ten directions, unconquerable, victorious over the armies of gods and nƒÅgas.

original: bde chen rgyal po gnyis med mchog dags rtag tu sdug bsngal rnams gnon rtsal //
analyzed: bde chen rgyal po gnyis med mchog dags rtag tu sdug bsngal rnams gnon rtsal //
translated: The king of great bliss, the supreme bliss of nonduality, always tramples on suffering.

original: rgyal ba dgra rgyal sdug bsngal sdig 'joms dpa' bo dpa' chen la phyag 'tshal //
analyzed: rgyal ba dgra rgyal sdug bsngal sdig 'joms dpa' bo dpa' chen la phyag 'tshal //
translated: Homage to the Victorious One, the Conqueror of Enemies, the Hero, the Great Hero, who conquers suffering and evil.

original: gar dgu'i nyams ldan cung zad zhil zhi zhing khro dang khro zhing zhi //
analyzed: gar dgu'i nyams ldan cung zad zhil zhi zhing khro dang khro zhing zhi //
translated: Endowed with the nine expressions of dance, he is slightly melted, peaceful, wrathful, wrathful and peaceful.

original: brtul zhugs mchog 'dzin stobs bcu'i dbang phyug mi dang lha las rnam par rgyal //
analyzed: brtul zhugs mchog 'dzin stobs bcu'i dbang phyug mi dang lha las rnam par rgyal //
translated: He is the lord of the ten powers, upholding supreme discipline, victorious over humans and gods.

original: sa gsum bdag po lha yi ltar gyur bde gshegs ma lus phrin las bsgrubs //
analyzed: sa gsum bdag po lha yi ltar gyur bde gshegs ma lus phrin las bsgrubs //
translated: He is the lord of the three worlds, like a god, accomplishing the activity of all sugatas.

original: mi g-yo mi 'gyur rtag tu brtan nas de bzhin nyid yul zab mo'i lam //
analyzed: mi g-yo mi 'gyur rtag tu brtan nas de bzhin nyid yul zab mo'i lam //
translated: Unwavering, unchanging, always firm, the path of profound suchness.

original: sgyu ma mkha' 'gro nyid kyi thugs chud ma lus 'gro la rjes chags nas //
analyzed: sgyu ma mkha' 'gro nyid kyi thugs chud ma lus 'gro la rjes chags nas //
translated: Having fully realized the mind of the dakinis of illusion, out of love for all beings,

original: slar yang 'dir zhugs skal ldan srog chags snying gi padmo kha phye nas //
analyzed: slar yang 'dir zhugs skal ldan srog chags snying gi padmo kha phye nas //
translated: again entering here, the fortunate ones, having opened the lotus of the heart,üîΩfree from attachment, liberated from ignorance, having destroyed hatred,

original: chags med chags bral gti mug las grol rab tu sdang ba rnam par bshig / kun du rtog spangs rab tu brtan gnas nges pa'i sar chud de nyid thugs rjes khros pa yi //
analyzed: chags med chags bral gti mug las grol rab tu sdang ba rnam par bshig / kun du rtog spangs rab tu brtan gnas nges pa'i sar chud de nyid thugs rjes khros pa yi //
translated: having abandoned conceptualization, abiding in firmness, having reached the stage of certainty,üîΩthe wrathful one, out of compassion, displays the form of Bhairava, with three blazing faces, white, red, and blue,

original: 'jigs byed skur bstan 'bar ba'i zhal gsum dkar dang dmar po sngon po'i mdog / spyan gsum thogs med smra smin ser g-yo ba'i ba sbu gyen du 'greng //
analyzed: 'jigs byed skur bstan 'bar ba'i zhal gsum dkar dang dmar po sngon po'i mdog / spyan gsum thogs med smra smin ser g-yo ba'i ba sbu gyen du 'greng //
translated: with three eyes, unimpeded, with yellow eyebrows, the body hairs erect,

original: dmar zlum spyan ba zlog 'od 'bar las byung bgegs tshogs bsreg pa'i me stag 'phro //
analyzed: dmar zlum spyan ba zlog 'od 'bar las byung bgegs tshogs bsreg pa'i me stag 'phro //
translated: with round red eyes rolling, emitting sparks of fire burning the hordes of obstructors.

original: ye shes rnon po'i mche ba gnyis gtsigs rngams shing bzhad pa'i zhal bgrad de //
analyzed: ye shes rnon po'i mche ba gnyis gtsigs rngams shing bzhad pa'i zhal bgrad de //
translated: With two sharp wisdom fangs bared, the wrathful one bares his gaping mouth,

original: ha ha'i sgra sgrogs rta skad mtshor ba'i nga ro ku tso gad rgyangs 'byin //üîΩrtabs shing rab brgyal 'khrugs pa'i skad gsang ngar ngar rab ser 'o 'dod 'bod //
analyzed: ha ha'i sgra sgrogs rta skad mtshor ba'i nga ro ku tso gad rgyangs 'byin // rtabs shing rab brgyal 'khrugs pa'i skad gsang ngar ngar rab ser 'o 'dod 'bod //
translated: You utter the sound of ‚Äúha ha,‚Äù the neighing of a horse, and the sound of ‚Äúku cu,‚Äù and you laugh.üîΩYou are frightened, faint, and agitated, and you utter a loud, harsh sound, and you call out ‚Äúhu hu.‚Äù

original: gdug pa'i snying 'byin ma rungs snang 'tshod gcong sgra drag pos sa 'khrugs pa //
analyzed: gdug pa'i snying 'byin ma rungs snang 'tshod gcong sgra drag pos sa 'khrugs pa //
translated: You rip out the hearts of the wicked, you burn the wicked, and you shake the earth with a loud sound.

original: rnam rgyal khro bo bdud dgra dpung 'dul phrin las lha dbang khyod phyag 'tshal //
analyzed: rnam rgyal khro bo bdud dgra dpung 'dul phrin las lha dbang khyod phyag 'tshal //
translated: You are the wrathful conqueror, the enemy of demons, the subduer of armies, the god of activity. I pay homage to you.

original: dmar ser 'gying ba'i ral pa gcig bcas bde gshegs gtso bo mi bskyod pas //
analyzed: dmar ser 'gying ba'i ral pa gcig bcas bde gshegs gtso bo mi bskyod pas //
translated: You have a single, swaying red-orange lock of hair, and the principal sugata Ak·π£obhya

original: @174b dregs pa'i dbu rgyan sangs rgyas rnam lnga'i mi thod 'jigs pa'i phreng ba can //
analyzed: @174b dregs pa'i dbu rgyan sangs rgyas rnam lnga'i mi thod 'jigs pa'i phreng ba can //
translated: is on your head. You have a garland of terrifying human skulls, the five buddhas.

original: autpal padmo mi yi rgyu zhags sbrul gdug khros pa'i rna rgyan can //
analyzed: autpal padmo mi yi rgyu zhags sbrul gdug khros pa'i rna rgyan can //
translated: You have earrings of utpala flowers, lotuses, human intestines, and poisonous snakes.

original: de bzhin mi rus rin chen sbrul rgyan shin tu 'od 'bar 'jigs pa yi //
analyzed: de bzhin mi rus rin chen sbrul rgyan shin tu 'od 'bar 'jigs pa yi //
translated: You have ornaments of human bone, jewels, and snakes, and you blaze with light.

original: rgyan rnams kyis brgyan sil sil sgra sgrogs kun nas bsdigs pa'i stabs kyis 'gyed pa'i tshul //
analyzed: rgyan rnams kyis brgyan sil sil sgra sgrogs kun nas bsdigs pa'i stabs kyis 'gyed pa'i tshul //
translated: Adorned with ornaments, jingling, with a threatening gesture.

original: phyag g-yas gri gug rdo rje ral gri de bzhin g-yon phyag mgo byed dang // autpal sdong mdzes dri bsung yid 'phrog phyogs bcur ngad ldan thugs kar 'dzin //
analyzed: phyag g-yas gri gug rdo rje ral gri de bzhin g-yon phyag mgo byed dang // autpal sdong mdzes dri bsung yid 'phrog phyogs bcur ngad ldan thugs kar 'dzin //
translated: In his right hands he holds a flaying knife, a vajra, and a sword; in his left hands he holds a skull, a lotus, and a beautiful fragrant jasmine flower, which he holds to his heart, its scent pervading the ten directions.

original: dpal ldan gtso bo'i thub pa thub mchog mi pham gcig pu rnam par gnon//
analyzed: dpal ldan gtso bo'i thub pa thub mchog mi pham gcig pu rnam par gnon//
translated: The glorious chief, the sage, the supreme sage, the invincible one, the solitary one, the conqueror,

original: stang stabs pa grad pas phat ces brjod cing lha yi brtan po mi 'gul zhabs g-yas ni //
analyzed: stang stabs pa grad pas phat ces brjod cing lha yi brtan po mi 'gul zhabs g-yas ni //
translated: with a dancing step, saying ‚Äúpha·π≠,‚Äù his right foot

original: dbugs bral gtso bo'i mgo bo nas brdzis g-yon pas gzhi bas pa'i rkang gnyis mnan //
analyzed: dbugs bral gtso bo'i mgo bo nas brdzis g-yon pas gzhi bas pa'i rkang gnyis mnan //
translated: tramples on the head of the dead chief, and his left foot presses down on the two feet of the dead one.

original: dpa' bo stag lpags spu rtse rab 'khrug du ba 'khyil 'dra gson pa ni //
analyzed: dpa' bo stag lpags spu rtse rab 'khrug du ba 'khyil 'dra gson pa ni //
translated: The hero, with the tip of his tiger-skin skirt bristling, like swirling smoke,

original: bshus pa'i yod la da ltar khrag 'jag glo bur stabs pas blangs nas su //
analyzed: bshus pa'i yod la da ltar khrag 'jag glo bur stabs pas blangs nas su //
translated: having suddenly torn off the skin of the living one, with blood still dripping,

original: khros pas bskyod 'dra mi yi skyob pa pha rol dpung rnams rnam bzlog cing //
analyzed: khros pas bskyod 'dra mi yi skyob pa pha rol dpung rnams rnam bzlog cing //
translated: Like one enraged, you ward off the armies of foes, the protectors of men.

original: nyid kyi phyogs bsrung zhi rgyas dbang dra ma lus gsang sngags mngon par bsgrub //
analyzed: nyid kyi phyogs bsrung zhi rgyas dbang dra ma lus gsang sngags mngon par bsgrub //
translated: You guard your own side, and pacify, increase, and subjugate, and you accomplish all the secret mantras.

original: thog med rab ltar shin tu mi zlogs kun gyis mi thub thub dka' ba ;
analyzed: thog med rab ltar shin tu mi zlogs kun gyis mi thub thub dka' ba ;
translated: You are invincible, like the sky, and cannot be overcome by anyone. You are difficult to conquer.

original: / nam mkha' kun khyab sa chen g-yos mdzad bde gshegs gtso bo khyod phyag 'tshal //
analyzed: / nam mkha' kun khyab sa chen g-yos mdzad bde gshegs gtso bo khyod phyag 'tshal //
translated: You are the foremost of the Sugatas, who shake the great earth and pervade the sky. I pay homage to you.

original: gang gi snying ni gtso bo chu skyes gsar 'khrungs phyogs kyis mtshon 'dra'i kha dog can //
analyzed: gang gi snying ni gtso bo chu skyes gsar 'khrungs phyogs kyis mtshon 'dra'i kha dog can //
translated: Your heart is the foremost, a newly born lotus, with a color like the direction it faces.

original: dkar ser dmar ljang rab tu gsal rgyal de dbus rab tu 'bar ba'i h'um //
analyzed: dkar ser dmar ljang rab tu gsal rgyal de dbus rab tu 'bar ba'i h'um //
translated: White, yellow, red, and green, very clear, with a blazing H≈™·πÇ in the center.

original: ye shes 'od 'phros 'gro ba'i sdig bsregs phyogs bcur mkhas khyab 'gengs pa yi //
analyzed: ye shes 'od 'phros 'gro ba'i sdig bsregs phyogs bcur mkhas khyab 'gengs pa yi //
translated: Wisdom light radiates and burns away the world's negativities, pervading the ten directions with the sky's expanse.

original: me lce'i phreng dkrigs mkha' la nyi ltar kun nas rtag tu lham me ba //
analyzed: me lce'i phreng dkrigs mkha' la nyi ltar kun nas rtag tu lham me ba //
translated: A garland of fire's flames is arranged in the sky, always shining all around like the sun.

original: de yi mthar ni ngag gi 'bru skar ma'i 'od can rnam pa'i bzhi //
analyzed: de yi mthar ni ngag gi 'bru skar ma'i 'od can rnam pa'i bzhi //
translated: At its end are the syllables of speech, with the light of stars in the four directions.

original: gsal bar bltas te mchod sogs sngon 'gro ji bzhin ji snyed tshogs bsgrubs nas //
analyzed: gsal bar bltas te mchod sogs sngon 'gro ji bzhin ji snyed tshogs bsgrubs nas //
translated: Having accomplished the entire accumulation, such as the offerings, and so on,

original: grub pa'i las ni rnam bzhi'i phrin las sa gsum lus can kun spro mdzad //
analyzed: grub pa'i las ni rnam bzhi'i phrin las sa gsum lus can kun spro mdzad //
translated: the four types of activities of the four limbs are performed.üîΩHaving returned from that, the body, speech, and mind are purified of stains.

original: de las slar 'ongs dkar bsil lus ngag yid kyi dri ma rnam bar dag / byas nas rdo rjes bla ma'i zhal blangs de nyid ye shes mnyam zhag ste //
analyzed: de las slar 'ongs dkar bsil lus ngag yid kyi dri ma rnam bar dag / byas nas rdo rjes bla ma'i zhal blangs de nyid ye shes mnyam zhag ste //
translated: Having taken the guru‚Äôs speech with the vajra, one should rest in the gnosis of suchness.

original: @175a * // sku gsung thugs dag de bzhin dag de'ang dri med gang yin gang //
analyzed: @175a * // sku gsung thugs dag de bzhin dag de'ang dri med gang yin gang //
translated: The body, speech, and mind are pure, and that is also stainless.

original: de nyid ye shes dang shes bral mtha' rnams las dben kun spyod pa //
analyzed: de nyid ye shes dang shes bral mtha' rnams las dben kun spyod pa //
translated: That is free from gnosis and consciousness, and the conduct is isolated from extremes.

original: rnal 'byor chen po bde chen de ni bla ma'i drin thob khyod kyis bsgrubs //
analyzed: rnal 'byor chen po bde chen de ni bla ma'i drin thob khyod kyis bsgrubs //
translated: That great bliss of the great yoga is accomplished through the kindness of the guru.

original: brtse ba'i rgyud bskyod byin rlabs me ni rnam mdun rnam gsum ye shes snying po lce mdud bcas //
analyzed: brtse ba'i rgyud bskyod byin rlabs me ni rnam mdun rnam gsum ye shes snying po lce mdud bcas //
translated: The fire of the moving stream of compassion, the three knots of the essence of the three gnostises,

original: sa gsum na khyab bdag dang bdag med yod med dri ma ma lus las //
analyzed: sa gsum na khyab bdag dang bdag med yod med dri ma ma lus las //
translated: the pervader of the three worlds, the lord of the three worlds, is free from all stains of existence and nonexistence.

original: rnam dben de ni rgyal pa'i sku zhes 'dren pa khyod kyis mthu ston cing //
analyzed: rnam dben de ni rgyal pa'i sku zhes 'dren pa khyod kyis mthu ston cing //
translated: You, O Guide, have shown the power of that isolation, which is the body of the Victorious One.

original: de rjes dri med sgyu 'dra mkha' 'dra rnam gsum rnam thar sgo spyod pa //
analyzed: de rjes dri med sgyu 'dra mkha' 'dra rnam gsum rnam thar sgo spyod pa //
translated: After that, you practiced the three doors of liberation, which are like illusions, stainless, and like space.

original: so so rang rig snying gi dbus gnas bde gshegs snying po rtogs dka' ba //
analyzed: so so rang rig snying gi dbus gnas bde gshegs snying po rtogs dka' ba //
translated: You realized the sugata essence, which is in the center of the heart, difficult to realize, and known by each one for himself.üîΩO holy one, who makes it known, O sage, O lord of men, O lord of gods, O one with a single lock of hair,

original: rtogs mdzad dam pa drang srong mi dbang lha yi dbang phyug ral pa gcig / kun rtog mi zad 'ching ba mi gnas shes rab pha rol phyin dbang gis //
analyzed: rtogs mdzad dam pa drang srong mi dbang lha yi dbang phyug ral pa gcig / kun rtog mi zad 'ching ba mi gnas shes rab pha rol phyin dbang gis //
translated: by the power of the perfection of wisdom, you do not dwell in the bonds of the inexhaustible conceptual thoughts.

original: gcod pa'i mtshon cha shes rab ral gri chags med chags bral autpal mtshan //
analyzed: gcod pa'i mtshon cha shes rab ral gri chags med chags bral autpal mtshan //
translated: The weapon that cuts is the sword of wisdom, the sign of the utpala, free of attachment, free from attachment.üîΩWith hundreds of signs of practice, such as recitation, austerities, fire offerings, giving,

original: bzlas brjod dka' thub sbyin sreg gtong sogs sgrub pa'i mtshan ma brgya phrag gis //
analyzed: bzlas brjod dka' thub sbyin sreg gtong sogs sgrub pa'i mtshan ma brgya phrag gis //
translated: and so forth, you are not able to equal

original: mnyam par mi nus gang zhig lam min de nyid de lam gzhan min pa //
analyzed: mnyam par mi nus gang zhig lam min de nyid de lam gzhan min pa //
translated: the one who is not on the path, who is not on that path, who is not on another path.

original: shin tu zab mo gsang ba'i lam gyur yang dag sbas pa mngon rnyed pa //
analyzed: shin tu zab mo gsang ba'i lam gyur yang dag sbas pa mngon rnyed pa //
translated: You have manifestly found the true secret, the path that is very profound.

original: dpal gyi dpal dbang srid gsum thi bas po'i mun 'joms ral pa gcig 'chang khyod //
analyzed: dpal gyi dpal dbang srid gsum thi bas po'i mun 'joms ral pa gcig 'chang khyod //
translated: Glory of glories, you who destroy the darkness of the three worlds, you who hold the single braid,

original: phyag 'tshal dpal ldan 'jig rten gsum rgyal po //
analyzed: phyag 'tshal dpal ldan 'jig rten gsum rgyal po //
translated: Homage to you, glorious conqueror of the three worlds,

original: sku gsung thugs dag srid 'joms pa //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs dag srid 'joms pa //
translated: whose body, speech, and mind are pure, who conquers existence,

original: zhi bas mi bsnyel phrin las sgrub //üîΩlha yi lha mchog ral pa gcig / dus gsum rgyal ba'i ye shes kyi //
analyzed: zhi bas mi bsnyel phrin las sgrub // lha yi lha mchog ral pa gcig / dus gsum rgyal ba'i ye shes kyi //
translated: who accomplishes enlightened activity without forgetting the peaceful state.üîΩSupreme god, you who have the single braid,üîΩsupreme deity arisen from the realm of space,

original: mkha' dbyings las byung lha mchog nyid //
analyzed: mkha' dbyings las byung lha mchog nyid //
translated: the wisdom of the victors of the three times,

original: ye shes 'od zer steng 'bar ba //
analyzed: ye shes 'od zer steng 'bar ba //
translated: with wisdom light rays blazing above,üîΩinvincible, you who have the single braid,

original: gzhan gyis mi thub ral pa thub pa gcig / sna tshogs pad nyid thod par ro //
analyzed: gzhan gyis mi thub ral pa thub pa gcig / sna tshogs pad nyid thod par ro //
translated: on a variegated lotus-sun-corpse seat,

original: h'um dang gri gug las byung ba //
analyzed: h'um dang gri gug las byung ba //
translated: arisen from h≈´·πÉ and a flaying knife,üîΩwith three faces and four arms, supreme wisdom body,

original: ye shes sku mchog zhal gsum phyag / bzhi ldan bcom ldan khyod phyag 'tshal //
analyzed: ye shes sku mchog zhal gsum phyag / bzhi ldan bcom ldan khyod phyag 'tshal //
translated: I pay homage to you, transcendent conqueror.üîΩHolding a flaying knife, sword, skull cup, and utpala flower,

original: gri gug ral gri thod pa dang // autpal 'dzin mdzad 'jigs pa'i sku //
analyzed: gri gug ral gri thod pa dang // autpal 'dzin mdzad 'jigs pa'i sku //
translated: you have a terrifying form,

original: padmo yi ge rnam pa lngas //
analyzed: padmo yi ge rnam pa lngas //
translated: with five aspects of the lotus and the syllables,

original: sa gsum sbyong mdzad khyod phyag 'tshal //
analyzed: sa gsum sbyong mdzad khyod phyag 'tshal //
translated: you purify the three worlds‚ÄîI pay homage to you.

original: mdag pa dang dag pa dag / dri med de ni ye shes dngos //
analyzed: mdag pa dang dag pa dag / dri med de ni ye shes dngos //
translated: the stainless, which is the actual gnosis.

original: thogs med rtag tu bsgyur nas ni //
analyzed: thogs med rtag tu bsgyur nas ni //
translated: You are unimpeded, always transforming,

original: 'gro ba'i don bsgrub khyod @175b phyag 'tshal //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i don bsgrub khyod @175b phyag 'tshal //
translated: accomplishing the welfare of beings‚Äîhomage to you!

original: dran pa tsam gyis bdud 'dul zhing //
analyzed: dran pa tsam gyis bdud 'dul zhing //
translated: Merely by being remembered, you tame MƒÅra,

original: dgra 'joms nyon mongs kun bsreg pa //üîΩbde chen snying rje stong pa nyid //
analyzed: dgra 'joms nyon mongs kun bsreg pa // bde chen snying rje stong pa nyid //
translated: conquer the foes, and burn away all afflictions.üîΩYou experience the taste of great bliss, compassion, and emptiness‚Äî

original: ro myong mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: ro myong mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: bcom ldan dpa' mo khro mo'i sku //
